original_text: When I come there to visit you, I hope you will be living in a good way. But I am afraid that I will not see what I want to see. Then you will see that I am different from what you want me to be! I am afraid that you may be quarrelling. You may be jealous of each other. You may be very angry with each other. Some of you may just want to please yourselves. You may be insulting one another, or telling lies about one another. You may be proud of how good you are. You may be causing trouble for one another. Yes, I am afraid that all those things may be happening among you.
korean_text: 내가 갈 때에 너희를 내가 원하는 것과 같이 보지 못하고 또 내가 너희에게 너희가 원하지 않는 것과 같이 보일까 두려워하며 또 다툼과 시기와 분냄과 당 짓는 것과 비방과 수군거림과 거만함과 혼란이 있을까 두려워하고

sentences.original_text: When I come there to visit you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신들을 방문하기 위해 거기에 갈 때

sentences.original_text: I hope you will be living in a good way
that I will not see what I want to see
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 보고 싶은 것을 보지 못할까봐

sentences.original_text: that I am different from what you want me to be
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신들이 원하는 사람과 다르다는 것을

sentences.original_text: I am afraid that you may be quarrelling
You may be jealous of each other
You may be very angry with each other
Some of you may just want to please yourselves
sentences.korean_translation: 일부는 그저 자신을 기쁘게 하려고 할지도 모릅니다

sentences.original_text: You may be insulting one another
or telling lies about one another
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 서로에 대해 거짓말하고 있을지도 모릅니다

sentences.original_text: You may be proud of how good you are
sentences.korean_translation: 자신이 얼마나 좋은지에 대해 자랑하고 있을지도 모릅니다

sentences.original_text: You may be causing trouble for one another
that all those things may be happening among you
sentences.korean_translation: 그 모든 것들이 당신들 가운데 일어나고 있을까 봐
